meta_data.description: 1600 Sq. Ft. - Rent 3 BHK Apartment / Flat in Aims Golf Avenue 2, Sector 75 Noida * 5 Property & locality photos * Unfurnished * - 12th floor (out of 16). View contact number for free. Click for complete details on 99acres.com

structured_data.description: This lovely 3 bhk apartment for rent in sector 75 noida is available in one of noida's most popular projects, aims golf avenue 2. This 3 bhk flat comes with 3 bathrooms set in usable area. This property is constructed on 1600 sq.Ft. You also get 1 covered parking inside the premises located on 12th of 16 floor. This is a ready to move property and it is 1-5 years old flat. This is an unfurnished flat. Property will be leased for 11 months from mon, 10 nov 2025 to family only with a notice of 1 month for a duration of 11 months. We are offering this property on  35,000 monthly. Electricity & water charges are not included in rent & to be paid separately.  70000 is required to be paid as the initial payment. Built in features are reserved parking, feng shui / vaastu compliant, piped-Gas, intercom facility and power back-Up etc. You will get access to swimming pool, fitness centre / gym, club house / community center, park, grocery shop, cctv surveillance, lift(s), security personnel and maintenance staff etc. In this society. Additional features with this property include rain water harvesting, corner property, pet friendly, wheelchair friendly and in a gated society. Power backup: Full. The flat has a east orientation. The flat's flooring is wood.
